channel.title: Server status checker problem
channel.description:
Not sure if this is the right section but... here i go.
Ive been trying to add my server to the moparscape status page but i always get the same message that my server is offline but guess what... its not! I know its definetly not cause people have been conecting to my server and me and my bro are on right now. The Ip is servergame.com so does the staus check only do no-ip.org ones and that kind of thing perhaps?

item.title: Server status checker problem
item.dc:creator: @x_bilson_x x bilson x
item.description:
@x_bilson_x wrote:

this happens with my server 2 my server is cripscape2.servegame.org and it wont let any of my friends on it but me and im running the server but i think u need 2 download Aryan 2 let it work and i think thAts what i need 2 do.

Read full topic
